links.title: Electric Vehicle ETF Revs Up (NYSE:KARS)
links.description: Investors looking for a way to tap the electric vehicle boom via exchange traded funds have their fund. The KraneShares Electric Vehicles & Future Mobility ETF (NYSE:KARS) debuted last week. The KraneShares Electric Vehicles & Future Mobility ETF is something of a departure for New York-based KraneShares, an ETF issuer known primarily for its lineup of China and emerging markets offerings.

links.title: Wish List For Apple Inc. Acquisitions: Tesla Inc, Netflix, Inc. -- And Then Reality
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) made a very loud announcement about its plans for cash repatriation, including 20,000 jobs. Many analysts are pointing out that it didn't include anything that's of interest to investors. Because of the glaring hole, some are filling it with suggestions for Apple acquisitions

links.title: AlgoWins
links.description: The tool indicates "Short Confidence" How much skin are Short sellers willing to risk? Since we used to have an algorithm call the data daily.. this simplified things and was made available to the public combining the Q,N,Z - TRF reports. Link of interest regarding short sale transparency http://www.sec.gov/news/press/2009/2009-172.htm Data generated with an SRO report.
